title: How to Use This Catalogue
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">This catalogue documents the exhibition GO, held at the Art Institute of Chicago from February 23 to June 4, 2017. The publication features illustrations of works from the checklist and reflections by the curators as well as recordings, images, and texts documenting the performances staged in association with the exhibition.

The Modern Series: GO was produced by the Art Institute of Chicago and built using the OSCI Toolkit, an open-source, digital-publishing platform. The publication features interactive elements and a modular design. For more information regarding the navigation of this publication, please make use of the Help menu in the upper right corner of your screen.

Interactive Wall </section><section id="figures"> Interactive Wall </section>
